text: The Italian Job is a 1969 British comedy-drama crime movie. It is about a gang of British criminals who rob an armoured van of its gold cargo in Turin, Italy. It stars Michael Caine, Noel Coward and Benny Hill. It was written by Troy Kennedy Martin and directed by Peter Collinson. A remake was made in 2003. == Other websites == * Category:1969 comedy-drama movies Category:1969 crime movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:Chase movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:Heist movies Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies directed by Peter Collinson
title: The Italian Job
